documents.document: Just let a dog with no hips. Due to the lower bone/floof ratio it is even cuter than fully-hipped puppers.

I have no idea how Macs work.
They instill fear in me
Throwing money at problems always works best. That's why rich people never have shit kids.
Revolutions start with rabble rousing.
@chennanigans has anyone told him it's fine for dudes to wear makeup?
International law is only becoming effective because this generation of educated is being told it's effective.
"The Bill of Rights as a Defence: The Last Refuge of a Scoundrel"
@SofaRobb genuinely considering the caravan lifestyle
@SofaRobb I just want someone to blame and the Americans seem a good target.
@SofaRobb I'm just super pissy because it's hard enough to find flats and I'm goin to be homeless.
Met a guy organising flats for 20 friends who are abandoning the US After the election. Wonder how they feel about refugees.
@TedTedwin @jessicaavery_ you want to be fellated by Nixon?
@jessicaavery_ it was a simpler time. Failing to Lick Dicks and Watering one's Gate
The recycling centre is the place to make friends Guy talked about how he committed insurance fraud for a new TV on the way to the e-waste.
These world championship darts players look like extras off Coronation Street.
Is your name on any Forbes lists? Then don't tell me how to get rich.
With the diet I'm on, two bottles of red wine is my daily recommended calorie intake. Guess I don't eat anymore.
If you hadn't read the books, the plot in the movies about Voldy-mate stashing his soul in sundry chattels is a bit of a snarl up.
How much does a nice hermit cave set you back these days?
@GeorgiaOG2 welcome back OG2. If only OG1 were here to share this moment.
I was jealous of immortality, but remembered jellyfish are immortal and as a species have achieved very little with it #jellythoughts
This invertebrate jellyfish has more spine, charisma and likeability than some people I've had to deal with #jellythoughts
Jellyfish in the water look delicate and majestic. On land they look like hangover vomit in a showercap. #jellythoughts
Nana with the prime MDMA https://t.co/R308wneJhM
"Tell you what, I've just never had a good home made babaganoush"
I am neither conventional nor usual
@sonniewonnie hope they will be unrelentless and vehement.
"My lasagne is your lasagne bro" - true friendship
Im retaining water like a dehydrated camel lately. Makes buying new shirts nearly untenable.
@jessicaavery_ who tipped you offf about that MatÃ¨?

@garethmorgannz "let's light a fuse under [parliament]"
Are you Guy Fawkes and his band of pyro-enthusiast Catholics? If so good timing.
@jessicaavery_ don't forget mushrooms and blue cheese
@alexa_ruthless it's almost as if we don't have a global digital network which allows for the instantaneous transmission of information.
@alexa_ruthless I'm with you. More accessible, better turnout. And not relying on the postal system can't be a bad thing (damn local body)
@jessicaavery_ I was never going to share so there was no need to broadcast.
@alexa_ruthless wait, are we not to believe that electronic voting spells the end of our fragile democracies?
Turns out one can very much over-caramelise mushroom and blue cheese sauce.
Fork count in this house has dropped to zero. Did the Catholic Church of the Middle Ages come through? #EatWithYourGodGivenFingers
New Plymouth is getting a cheeky Nandos. Biggest development since that building made of mirrors turned up.
@GeorgeEGe I don't believe myself to be either. Maybe a large purple number with a feather?
I'd like to start wearing hats but every hat either seems to be for fuckboys or neck beards.
No one dresses really scary for Halloween. Didn't see a single 'my uncertain future' costume.
@jessicaavery_ @Kat_Rad you're so weird
@jessicaavery_ we reached the use independently. Also it's in the dictionary m9.
@jessicaavery_ it's seasonal. Like when everyone changes their colours to black for rugby stuff.
Is it too late to retrain as a doctor and go do some brief good in the world?
@lindauerpapi someone behind me opened their paper and just whispered "fuck". Think we're all on the same page.
Halfway through a fact problem about 'Fat Mobile' I started calling it Fat Bird. #ThirstyProle
"Saturday exams, because we don't shit them up enough already" - some fuckspanner.
His voluminous, superfluous chins enveloped his moon-face like a fleshy ruff.
Just because your Marxist Utopia is classless doesn't mean you have to be.
@jessicaavery_ @Kat_Rad I swear we were talking about competence not appearance thanks Regina
@jessicaavery_ It's true.
Things customers call me: Good - George, mate. Bad - Boss, Chief, Sir, Mister, fuckhead.
Eating spicy shit makes that cheap wine taste like the most delicate sweetness known to either God or man.
If you're going to leave me passive aggressive notes at least leave a contact number so I can tell you exactly how to go fuck yourself.
@chrissybrown @anya_maule @VUWSA context is extremely important
Don't wanna work, wanna make money while I sleep. So I prudently invested in a balance portfolio of equities and bonds.
That was a fucking day and a half.
Today the waterfront bore witness to tensions involving four grown men and a security guard over a cauliflower.
Once we had about 36 forks in this house. Every single one is gone now and Kmart is calling.
I'll do me. You do you. We can compare how we end up.
@chrissybrown @jessicaavery_ it was funny though
@chrissybrown @jessicaavery_ I had a very near miss with a bus on my bike, it scared the shit out of me and I thought I was going to die.
@jessicaavery_ different kind of organ donation
Become an organ doner today: cycle in Wellington.
Daylight savings really messes up my "no hard liquor before sundown" rule.
Been a long time since I've had "faggot" yelled at me out of a moving car. Has New Plymouth come to Wellington?
This day is so beige. I just.... Wanna burn it all.
When I'm cycling I change gear more often than an experimental junkie.
@realVUWSAwatch who are you person of the anonymous twitters?
Move over Fresher Five I just put on the Election Eight.
@chennanigans she was telling us about her love shed she lived in as a student when she was at Kelburn
@jessicaavery_ there's also some banger quotes in the exec column I wrote this week
It's way too hard to find an empty tute room to have a bit of a kip in.
Cheeky Dick pic. https://t.co/8ekfP2j5Fp
"Do you think he's into Winston Peters pegging role play?" - @JessMcBurney
@alexa_ruthless in favour but only on Hawaiian.
@jackestpersona are you VUWSA's conscience? Your spot on questioning make me feel things deep down inside. #vuwsavotes
@TedTedwin if that's what the people want I am happy to investigate and initiate this new initiative. #VuwsaVotes
@anya_maule The slush fund is a lie.
@chennanigans @hyphenating @VUWSA fair point, we don't want to be the Council Whipping Boy
@chennanigans @hyphenating @VUWSA good point. Definitely more in favour of partnership
@chennanigans @VUWSA funding arrangements aren't inherently erosions of independence. We would be extremely careful
@hyphenating @chennanigans @VUWSA on this one that is perfect. We shouldn't rule out other arrangements though
@chennanigans @VUWSA ideally yes but that level of independence is a few years off. For now we have to do what we can.
@chennanigans @VUWSA definitely! It would depend on what the council wanted us to do. Independence is crucial, isolationism isn't.
Does the council wanna make some donations to @VUWSA to educate students about some things? #StudentsVote
@gnomespeacock straight after this?
@JoelRowan I did not know that. Not sure if the candidates do either...
Off peak reductions? Sorry do students not travel at peak times there Andy? #StudentsVote
Media in danger Helene? You're the only one going after them in here. #StudentsVote
Students don't vote because there's nothing voluntarily offered to us. @VUWSA had to fight for anything at all this year #StudentsVote
@nickoleggett greasing the wheels of democracy with support for e-voting. Good. #StudentsVote
How many students live in Manhattan Jo? Pretty expensy I hear #StudentsVote
Boy from Porirua not afraid of firing shots #StudentsVote
Can any of the candidates get local infrastructure working better than our sound setup? #StudentsVote
@chrissybrown @clayton_bryar @lithoboly was that the initial meeting I heard upstairs this arvo?
That late afternoon salmon sushi is not good for my health. #Sub-PrimeSalmonCrisis
@TedTedwin everything is property. Welcome to the capitalism hellscape.
